name: Obsidian Mirror
description: This plugins allows to sync the active open file among different Obsidian instances. Why? well, if you have multiple monitors and you want to use the local graph in a separate monitor, there is no chance to do it now. So  I had the idea to run multiple instances of Obsidian using the workaround via symbolinc links. This way the 2 instances are not in sync. This plugin closes the gap and syncs the active opened file among multiple Obsidian instances
author: Francesco Pistillo
